data.message: It would be nice if you all could get those trending poll thing off my page now they are still there, and not just one but three of them ,give us the option to delete them please, I am tired of them coming back and still on my page could you fix this problem now please, and thank you I hope.

replies.message: Hey Jonathon. There is currently no option to turn off trending from your News Feed, but we'll let our team know that you're interested! If there's anything else you would like to see, let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1KnKatK. -Nancy
Thank you for responding back but could please get them off my page now since that debate has been over for awhile, and Thank you!
